name: Path M Testis
title: Pathologic M
notes:
**Note:** Involvement of inguinal, pelvic, or external iliac lymph nodes **WITH** previous scrotal or inguinal surgery prior to presentation of the testis tumor is coded in N (regional lymph nodes) and not in M (distant metastasis).

**Distant lymph nodes WITHOUT previous scrotal or inguinal surgery or UNKNOWN if previous scrotal or inguinal surgery**

    External iliac 
    Inguinal nodes, NOS
        Deep, NOS
        Node of Cloquet or Rosenmuller (highest deep inguinal)
        Superficial (femoral)    
     Pelvic, NOS
